```{r}

```

```{r}

```


Boxplot of AirPassengers, using a point to represent the mean value.
```{r, fig.width=3, fig.height=5}
ggplot(df1, aes(x=1, y=AirPassengers)) + geom_boxplot() + geom_point(y=mean(df1$AirPassengers));
```
